articles.title: US slashes Russia trade status, bans import of alcohol, seafood - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The broad trade shift, which revokes the most favoured nation status for Russia, is being taken in coordination with the European Union and Group of Seven countries.
articles.content: United States President Joe Biden announced on March 11 that the US will dramatically downgrade its trade status with Russia as punishment for its invasion of Ukraine and also ban imports of Russian … [+3445 chars]

articles.author: Alex Druce
articles.title: Investors jump ahead of war-torn weekend - news.com.au
articles.description: The Australian sharemarket eased into the weekend as investors took risk off the table with one eye on the rolling conflict in Eastern Europe.
articles.content: The Australian sharemarket sagged into the weekend as hopes of a ceasefire between Russia and Ukraine faded and central banks continued to wrestle with mounting inflationary pressures.The Australian … [+4768 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Russia-Ukraine war: EU snubs Ukraine's quest to join - PerthNow
articles.description: Ukraine's hopes for quick entry to the European Union have been dealt a blow at an EU summit that aims to agree on a joint response to Russia's invasion.
articles.content: European Union leaders have condemned the unspeakable suffering Russia is inflicting on Ukraine but at a summit in France they have refused Kyivs appeal for rapid accession to the bloc and differ ove… [+3226 chars]
